I gave a quick glance to this stream, not sure this question was already asked. Is there a way to mark a topic unread the same way one can mark it as read?
I would be happy if I could simply mark a topic so that it stands somehow out of a list of topics
You can't, but you can star a message so you come back later (and remove the star after you've read it).

that would be equally fine (... searching how to star a topic ... )
thanks!
